price: 14. Ma jiro mid iyaga ka mid ah oo aan beenin Rususha, Markaasay xaq noqotay cadaabi inay ku dhacdo.
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
